TASK_CREATED.title: Task created successfully
TASK_CREATED.message: The task was created successfully. You can check it out in your task list!

SUBSCRIPTION_CREATED.title: Notifications enabled successfully
SUBSCRIPTION_CREATED.message: From now on, you can start receiving notifications from Tisk in this device

NOTIFICATIONS_ALLOWED.title: Notifications enabled successfully
NOTIFICATIONS_ALLOWED.message: From now on, you can start receiving notifications from Tisk again

NOTIFICATIONS_BLOCKED.title: Notifications disabled successfully
NOTIFICATIONS_BLOCKED.message: From now on, you won't receive any more notifications from Tisk in any of your devices

NOT_FOUND.title: Oops! Page not found
NOT_FOUND.message: Unfortunately, the page you are trying to access does not exist

SERVER_ERROR.title: Unknown error :(
SERVER_ERROR.message: An unexpected error ocurred, try again in a few moments.

FIELD_REQUIRED.title: Invalid data
FIELD_REQUIRED.message: You need to complete this field.

USERNAME_NOT_VALID.title: Invalid data
USERNAME_NOT_VALID.message: Username must have between 5 and 20 characters and can only include lowercase letters, numbers and underscores.

PASSWORD_NOT_VALID.title: Invalid data
PASSWORD_NOT_VALID.message: Password must be 12 characters minimum and must contain at least one letter and one number.

EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: User already exists
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: This email is already registered in Tisk.

WRONG_CREDENTIALS.title: Wrong credentials
WRONG_CREDENTIALS.message: Email or password is not valid

NOTIFICATIONS_DISABLED.title: Notifications are disabled
NOTIFICATIONS_DISABLED.message: Notifications are disabled in all devices. If you want to start receiving notifications from Tisk you must allow them first.
